game.name: Fear & Hope
game.shortDescription: An immersive choose your own adventure mystery game with sci-fi and detective/crime themes. Explore a brave new world containing unique puzzles, hidden clues, intriguing characters, monsters / enemies, weapons, survivalist elements and games of chance.
